DOC.criteria: age 18 year old BMI > 27 < 43 willing randomize one two treatment condition successful completion screen require 5day record food intake paper diary least two risk factor coronary heart disease , e.g. , overweight obese , hypertension , dyslipidemia , positive family history ( first degree relative ) NOTE : Although reside Western Pennsylvania explicit eligibility criterion , participant ask travel University Pittsburgh frequently ( weekly first month ) presence current serious illness unstable condition require physiciansupervised diet exercise ( e.g. , diabetes , recent acute myocardial infarction ) physician supervision diet physical activity prescription need physical limitation preclude ability engage physical activity moderate intensity pregnancy intention become pregnant next 18 month current treatment psychological disorder report alcohol intake > 4 drinks/day previous participation formal weight loss program within past 5 year , e.g. , Weight Watchers research program , current use weight loss medication plan extended vacation , absence , relocation within next 18 month
